section.p: This section lists and describes all relevant clinical problems at the time the document is generated. At a minimum, all pertinent current and historical problems should be listed. Overall health status may be represented in this section.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-9179, CONF:1198-10441, CONF:1198-32510 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Problem Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32864)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15409)/@code="11450-4" Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15410, CONF:1198-31142)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-9181)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-9182)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-9183, CONF:1198-15506)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:
Conforms to Problem Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3:2015-08-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-30479, CONF:1198-30480)
Conforms to Health Status Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Problem Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5)
SHALL conform to Problem Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32864)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15409)/@code="11450-4" Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15410, CONF:1198-31142)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-9181)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-9182)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7881, CONF:1198-15505)
Conforms to Problem Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3:2015-08-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-30481, CONF:1198-30482)
Conforms to Health Status Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5:2014-06-09)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-9183, CONF:1198-15506)
Conforms to Problem Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3:2015-08-01)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-30479, CONF:1198-30480)
Conforms to Health Status Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5:2014-06-09)

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" nullFlavor="NI"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5.1" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5" extension="2015-08-01"/> <code code="11450-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Problem List"/> <title>Problem List</title> <text>oNglPce qIROoa Ogaok EPHCpcbo MMgoAp xNjCHH KYMJWY yOZHFd SzPhvnEhA kOISPOW PkvBPbgq LupiMfD qMmjMFiM DlFFXnPSA WngVlaO wbwIuqvW PPgcGVMEQ BMgbxl zBzXciv lsSVA VMjlx uYSwVPA UgsfQLKDw ZwkJy IhfSDLCX HNFMo CDQHwX sCgScJv AQpTJQzU spwjIL QnMwKKaT PJLcZmVJu lYEKa vLqUjOkb RpXeYj WDBaTA WzYWE fZSfMWL JBnnQOz aZZKbB qytzdS jWjVjaazs WBkBHCbvB vFGul oMsLy NFtjM RnuAQ zBfFHxWwn gPiwF xGkJAEra NjSmrXC RBrmaMWs MMHUyceC EuLoFyiY mzYHFhZud phSNe iegwTuec MOLEV ovdezWZ whMDLVc mtUjnPFC rFjAICuof wTlyJQmNU EuGKJbSPc JOWtoXku isyFj uhwlg Bosxt HASVJIeOK PsGUXWT ojZFD LkCLJfrH eCdsg ZPGxmAqd nGFQvj ZzhZKqalz ryUbax uMcrioFRg ACAQD jedHWphZz SYflZHgk WoBgkv dhkaXsxUx mhuYiK bCEOCqlq RIsoleM rZzBIwLY YxCxXMo DWdcB JkLFR lcuof iCfcZNK bXuVA lwlFHDB </text> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5"/> <code code="11323-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Health status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entry> </section>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:9179 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5.1"
SHALL conform to Problem Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5)
Consol Problem Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:9183) Conforms to Problem Concern Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3)
Consol Problem Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15409)/@code="11450-4" Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15410)
Consol Problem Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:9182)
Consol Problem Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:9181)
